00036 #define MSQ_NODE_SET_HPP

00048 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00049 
00051 class MESQUITE_EXPORT NodeSet {
00052   public:
00053     typedef unsigned BitSet;
00054     
00058         //enum { 
00059       static const BitSet NUM_TOTAL_BITS = 8*sizeof(BitSet);
00060       static const BitSet MSB_POS = NUM_TOTAL_BITS - 1;
00062       static const BitSet NUM_CORNER_BITS = 8;
00064       static const BitSet NUM_EDGE_BITS = 16;
00066       static const BitSet NUM_REGION_BITS = 1;
00068       static const BitSet NUM_FACE_BITS = NUM_TOTAL_BITS - (NUM_CORNER_BITS + NUM_EDGE_BITS + NUM_REGION_BITS); 
00069       
00071       static const BitSet CORNER_OFFSET = 0;
00073       static const BitSet EDGE_OFFSET = CORNER_OFFSET + NUM_CORNER_BITS;
00075       static const BitSet FACE_OFFSET =   EDGE_OFFSET + NUM_EDGE_BITS;
00077       static const BitSet REGION_OFFSET = FACE_OFFSET + NUM_FACE_BITS;
00078     
00080       static const BitSet MID_NODE_MASK = (~0u) << NUM_CORNER_BITS;
00082       static const BitSet CORNER_MASK = ~MID_NODE_MASK;
00084       static const BitSet REGION_MASK = ~((~0u) >> NUM_REGION_BITS);
00086       static const BitSet EDGE_MASK = (MID_NODE_MASK << (NUM_TOTAL_BITS - EDGE_OFFSET - NUM_EDGE_BITS)) >> (NUM_TOTAL_BITS - EDGE_OFFSET - NUM_EDGE_BITS);
00088       static const BitSet FACE_MASK = ~(CORNER_MASK|EDGE_MASK|REGION_MASK);
00089     //};
00090 
00091   private:
00092     BitSet bits; 
00093     
00095     inline bool bit_to_bool( unsigned num ) const
00096       { return static_cast<bool>( (bits >> num) & 1u ); }
00097     
00099     inline void set_bit( unsigned num )
00100       { bits |= (1u << num); }
00101     
00102     inline void set_bits( unsigned start_bit, unsigned count )
00103       { bits |= (~((BitSet)0) >> (NUM_TOTAL_BITS - count)) << start_bit; }
00104     
00106     inline void clear_bit( unsigned num )
00107       { bits &= ~(1u << num); }
00108     
00112     unsigned num_before_bit( unsigned position ) const
00113       { return popcount(bits & ~((~0u) << position)); }
00114   
00115   public:
00116     
00117     NodeSet() : bits(0u) {}
00118     
00120     void clear() { bits = 0u; }
00121     
00123     inline void set_all_nodes( EntityTopology type );
00124     
00126     unsigned num_nodes() const
00127       { return popcount(bits); }
00128       
00130     BitSet have_any_mid_node() const
00131       { return bits & MID_NODE_MASK; }
00133     BitSet have_any_corner_node() const
00134       { return bits & CORNER_MASK; }
00136     BitSet have_any_mid_edge_node() const
00137       { return bits & EDGE_MASK; }
00139     BitSet have_any_mid_face_node() const
00140       { return bits & FACE_MASK; }
00142     BitSet have_any_mid_region_node() const
00143       { return bits & REGION_MASK; }
00144     
00146     static unsigned corner_node_position( unsigned num ) 
00147       { assert(num < NUM_CORNER_BITS); return num + CORNER_OFFSET; }
00149     static unsigned mid_edge_node_position( unsigned num ) 
00150       { assert(num < NUM_EDGE_BITS); return num + EDGE_OFFSET; }
00152     static unsigned mid_face_node_position( unsigned num ) 
00153       { assert(num < NUM_FACE_BITS); return num + FACE_OFFSET; }
00155     static unsigned mid_region_node_position( unsigned num = 0 ) 
00156       { assert(num < NUM_REGION_BITS); return num + REGION_OFFSET; }
00158     static unsigned position( Sample sample ) {
00159       switch (sample.dimension) { 
00160         case 0: return corner_node_position(sample.number); 
00161         case 1: return mid_edge_node_position(sample.number);
00162         case 2: return mid_face_node_position(sample.number);
00163         case 3: return mid_region_node_position(sample.number);
00164       }
00165       assert(0);
00166       return ~0u;
00167     }
00168     
00170     void set_corner_node( unsigned num ) 
00171       { set_bit( corner_node_position(num) ); }
00173     void set_mid_edge_node( unsigned num ) 
00174       { set_bit( mid_edge_node_position(num) ); }
00176     void set_mid_face_node( unsigned num ) 
00177       { set_bit( mid_face_node_position(num) ); }
00179     void set_mid_region_node( unsigned num = 0 ) 
00180       { set_bit( mid_region_node_position(num) ); }
00182     void set_node( Sample sample ) {
00183       switch (sample.dimension) { 
00184         case 0: set_corner_node(sample.number); break;
00185         case 1: set_mid_edge_node(sample.number); break;
00186         case 2: set_mid_face_node(sample.number); break;
00187         case 3: set_mid_region_node(sample.number); break;
00188         default: assert(0);
00189       }
00190     }
00191     
00193     void clear_corner_node( unsigned num ) 
00194       { clear_bit( corner_node_position(num) ); }
00196     void clear_mid_edge_node( unsigned num ) 
00197       { clear_bit( mid_edge_node_position(num) ); }
00199     void clear_mid_face_node( unsigned num ) 
00200       { clear_bit( mid_face_node_position(num) ); }
00202     void clear_mid_region_node( unsigned num = 0 ) 
00203       { clear_bit( mid_region_node_position(num) ); }
00205     void clear_node( Sample sample ) {
00206       switch (sample.dimension) { 
00207         case 0: clear_corner_node(sample.number); break;
00208         case 1: clear_mid_edge_node(sample.number); break;
00209         case 2: clear_mid_face_node(sample.number); break;
00210         case 3: clear_mid_region_node(sample.number); break;
00211         default: assert(0);
00212       }
00213     }
00214     
00216     bool corner_node( unsigned num ) const
00217       { return bit_to_bool( corner_node_position(num) ); }
00219     bool mid_edge_node( unsigned num ) const
00220       { return bit_to_bool( mid_edge_node_position(num) ); }
00222     bool both_edge_nodes( unsigned num1, unsigned num2 ) const
00223     { 
00224       BitSet b = (1<<mid_edge_node_position(num1))
00225                | (1<<mid_edge_node_position(num2));
00226       return (bits&b) == b; 
00227     }
00229     bool mid_face_node( unsigned num ) const
00230       { return bit_to_bool( mid_face_node_position(num) ); }
00232     bool mid_region_node( unsigned num = 0 ) const
00233       {  return bit_to_bool( mid_region_node_position(num) ); }
00235     bool node( Sample sample ) const {
00236       switch (sample.dimension) { 
00237         case 0: return corner_node(sample.number); break;
00238         case 1: return mid_edge_node(sample.number); break;
00239         case 2: return mid_face_node(sample.number); break;
00240         case 3: return mid_region_node(sample.number); break;
00241         default: assert(0); return false;
00242       }
00243     }
00244       
00246     inline void set_all_corner_nodes( EntityTopology type );
00248     inline void set_all_mid_edge_nodes( EntityTopology type );
00250     inline void set_all_mid_face_nodes( EntityTopology type );
00252     inline void set_all_mid_region_nodes( EntityTopology type );
00253       
00255     void clear_all_mid_nodes()
00256       { bits &= ~MID_NODE_MASK; }
00258     void clear_all_corner_nodes()
00259       { bits &= ~CORNER_MASK; }
00261     void clear_all_mid_edge_nodes()
00262       { bits &= ~EDGE_MASK; }
00264     void clear_all_mid_face_nodes()
00265       { bits &= ~FACE_MASK; }
00267     void clear_all_mid_region_nodes()
00268       { bits &= ~REGION_MASK; }
00269 
00271     unsigned num_before_corner( unsigned num ) const 
00272       { return num_before_bit( corner_node_position(num) ); } 
00274     unsigned num_before_mid_edge( unsigned num ) const 
00275       { return num_before_bit( mid_edge_node_position(num) ); } 
00277     unsigned num_before_mid_face( unsigned num ) const 
00278       { return num_before_bit( mid_face_node_position(num) ); } 
00280     unsigned num_before_mid_region( unsigned num ) const 
00281       { return num_before_bit( mid_region_node_position(num) ); } 
00283     unsigned num_before( Sample sample ) const {
00284       switch (sample.dimension) { 
00285         case 0: return num_before_corner(sample.number); break;
00286         case 1: return num_before_mid_edge(sample.number); break;
00287         case 2: return num_before_mid_face(sample.number); break;
00288         case 3: return num_before_mid_region(sample.number); break;
00289         default: assert(0); return ~0u;
00290       }
00291     }
00292     
00293     unsigned get_bits() const { return bits; }
00294 };
00295 
00298 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& s, NodeSet set );
00299       
00301 void NodeSet::set_all_corner_nodes( EntityTopology type )
00302   { set_bits( CORNER_OFFSET, TopologyInfo::corners(type) ); }
00304 void NodeSet::set_all_mid_edge_nodes( EntityTopology type )
00305   { set_bits(   EDGE_OFFSET, TopologyInfo::edges(type) ); }
00307 void NodeSet::set_all_mid_face_nodes( EntityTopology type )
00308   { set_bits(   FACE_OFFSET, TopologyInfo::faces(type) ); }
00310 void NodeSet::set_all_mid_region_nodes( EntityTopology type )
00311   { set_mid_region_node(); }
00312 
00313 void NodeSet::set_all_nodes( EntityTopology type )
00314 {
00315   switch (TopologyInfo::dimension(type)) {
00316     case 3: set_mid_region_node();
00317     case 2: set_all_mid_face_nodes( type );
00318     case 1: set_all_mid_edge_nodes( type );
00319     case 0: set_all_corner_nodes( type );
00320   }
00321 }
